name: Pirate's Pension
description:
ARRRRR! You are a retiring pirate trying to dig up all the treasures you hid over the years.

Each level you spawn somewhere on a new procedurally generated island with nothing but a map. You have no idea where you are. Orient your self by reading landmarks and find the "X".

CONTROLS:

Movement – W,A,S,D

Sprint – Shift

Toggle Map – Left Mouse

Reset/New Island – R

Quit – Escape
